cubature 2.0.3
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Version 2.0 Notes
  • Changelog

Changelog

cubature 2.0.3 2018-12-18

  • Fixed up stack overrun in Cuba-4.2/src/divonne/Split.c (lines 119–128 utilizing a flag for first time through loop
  • More cleanup of Makevars

cubature 2.0.2 2018-12-11

  • Fixed up uninitialized count for hcubature (Thanks, Ehsan Masoudi)
  • Tentative fix of infinite value for minfluct in Cuba-4.2/src/suave/Integrate.c in lines 197–205. (Thanks, Prof. Brian Ripley)
  • Miscellaneous fixes for compilation on various platforms.
  • Cleaned up Makevars and Makevars.win to remove some unused flags. Tentative fix for solaris in Makevars and Cuba-4.2/src/common/stddecl.c.
  • Removed printing of statefile in all the src/*/Integrate.c routines to avoid segfault on solaris.
  • Added ret_code for return value in call to getloadavg in Cuba-4.2/src/common/Fork.c. Also added an #ifdef SOLARIS for including appropriate header under solaris.
  • Fixed up call to MASTER variadic macro by including dummy argument 0 in Cuba-4.2/src/common/Fork.c, line 146.
  • Replaced multi-statement macro with a do { } while(0) hack.
  • Reworked code around Cuba-4.2/src/divonne/Rule.c checks for key values (lines 593 to 600).
  • Fixed up call to WORKER variadic macro by including dummy argument 0 in Cuba-4.2/src/common/Parallel.c, line 393.
  • Moved #ifdef FRAMECOPY outside in Cuba-4.2/src/common/Parallel.c to avoid embedding directives in macro args, lines 70-80.

cubature 2.0 2018-11-23

  • Major update. Integrates Cuba 4.2 library
  • Allows for finite or infinite limits of integration (courtesy of Simon Gaure)
  • Deprecates doChecking argument. Now it does nothing and will be removed in future versions.

cubature 1.4-1 2018-10-26

  • Fixed up scale argument to tests to conform to pass checks.
  • Removed any reference to orphaned package R2Cuba and updated vignette with information on imminent 2.0 release.

cubature 1.4 2018-06-13

  • Fixed up the C call so that it is re-entrant (brought to my attention by Pierre de Villemereuil). This should be considered a bug fix!

  • Corrected private notes

cubature 1.3-13 2018-06-11

  • Generated package docs using pkgdown
  • Synced up to cubature-1.0.3
  • Added LICENSE file (request of Nick Youngblut)

cubature 1.3-12 Unreleased

  • Minor typographical and documentation fixes

cubature 1.3-11 2017-07-19

  • Merged Manuel Koller’s registration for C code and vignette fix for NA.
  • Moved cubature header and exp_cubature headers to inst/include for linking to other packages

cubature 1.3-10 Unreleased

  • Renamed Readme.md to README.md
  • Removed references to ab-initio website that caused some hassle due to misconfigured site.

cubature 1.3-9 Unreleased

cubature 1.3-8 2017-05-11

cubature 1.3-7 Unreleased

  • Registered .Call stuff and removed microbenchmark suggestion in favor of benchr.

cubature 1.3-4 Unreleased

  • Generated smaller pcubature header (clencurt.h) using M = 16 and put back C cubature source in tree.

cubature 1.3-3 Unreleased

  • Moved the cubature-1.0.2 C library to github to avoid hitting the CRAN size limit.

cubature 1.3-2 Unreleased

  • Added vignette showing huge gains due to vectorization

cubature 1.3-1 Unreleased

  • Added pcubature
  • Added vector versions

cubature 1.3-0 Unreleased

  • Moved to SGJ cubature-1.0.2 version.
  • adaptIntegrate and hcubature are aliases
  • hcubature function gains a norm argument that is set to a sensible default so as not to affect depending packages

cubature 1.2-0 Unreleased

  • Moved to Rcpp framework
  • Added tests in preparation for SGJ cubature-1.0.2 version

cubature 1.1-3 Unreleased

  • Roxygenized in preparation for upgrade to newer version of cubature library on abinitio website

cubature 1.1-2 2013-02-25

  • Registered native cubature functions adapt_integrate and adapt_integrate_v so that they are directly callable from C (courtesy of Simen Gaure)

cubature 1.1-2 2013-02-25

  • Fixed typo in doc for function adaptIntegrate; default value for doChecking was incorrectly stated as TRUE

cubature 1.1-1 2011-12-08

  • Added doChecking argument (default FALSE) to save some computation time in evaluating integrand (9% speedup).

cubature 1.1 2011-11-22

  • Synced up to SGJ cubature routines dated 2010-10-18 on his website
  • Bugfix: potential memory leak fixed up in heap routine (my oversight!)
  • Routine adaptIntegrate gains … argument (request of Baptiste Auguie)
  • Corrected radius constant in testFn2 to match cubature output exactly

cubature 1.0 2009-12-20

  • Original version of package based on Steven G. Johnson’s cubature routines at http://ab-initio.mit.edu/wiki/index.php/Cubature
